@♥DESUMORPHINE♥ regarding that idea of yours, on the first thought, it doesn't seem so bad. There wouldn't be people whining about things as they do, and having a seperate site for a single purpose will surely heavily improve the experience of the desired consumers. HOWEVER, if you look this from the admin's perspective, it just wouldn't be worth it. They would have to invest much more time and money for the whole matter, and would even drop their overall profit (as @Flanky said it, loss of ad trafficing) for what reasons? People being too lazy to blacklist tags? If there's one thing I know for sure, I'm satisfied with how things are arranged (if you exclude all the meaningless bitching, but hey, it's still a freedom of speach). Honestly, this entire situation is just like your attitude towards those "degenerates", as you call them. Just plain wrong.

This work is truly a piece of heaven. However, as always, there will be those "pure-hearted" people who just can't get the right idea. So to those people: this work isn't just a porno, first and foremost this is a piece of ART. It's not like you have to "get turned on" by it to actually enjoy it. And just because someone is sexually aroused by the likes of this, doesn't even remotely mean they are "sick in the head". It's always just a matter of fetish, different people get turned on by different things, and as such there also will exist the extreme side of the spectrum. Hopefuly this will get trough your thick skulls.
